#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Auto-generated events used for creating bloodlines
namespace = ebl_hf

#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Create bloodline and generate event_target
character_event = {
	id = ebl_hf.5
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		# Update global ebl count
		change_variable = { which = global_ebl_bloodline_count value = 1 }

		# Set our ebl_bloodline ID
		set_variable = { which = founded_ebl_bloodline_id which = global_ebl_bloodline_count }

		# Create the bloodline
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value == 0 }
				}
			}
			create_bloodline = {
				type = ebl_hf_bloodline_pic_0
				inheritance = all_descendants
				allow_bastards = no
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value == 1 }
				}
			}
			create_bloodline = {
				type = ebl_hf_bloodline_pic_0
				inheritance = all_descendants
				allow_bastards = yes
			}

					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value == 65 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value == 2 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value == 0 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value == 1 }
				}
			}
			create_bloodline = {
				type = ebl_hf_bloodline_pic_65
				inheritance = patrilineal
				allow_bastards = yes
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value == 65 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value == 2 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value == 1 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value == 0 }
				}
			}
			create_bloodline = {
				type = ebl_hf_bloodline_pic_65_1
				inheritance = patrilineal
				allow_bastards = no
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value == 65 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value == 2 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value == 1 }
					check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value == 1 }
				}
			}
			create_bloodline = {
				type = ebl_hf_bloodline_pic_65_1
				inheritance = patrilineal
				allow_bastards = yes
			}
		}
		

		# Generate an event_target so main function can apply stats/descriptions
		new_bloodline = { save_global_event_target_as = ebl_bloodline_target }

		event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
			clr_bloodline_flag = created_bloodline
		}

		# Initialize the bloodlines' settings
		character_event = { id = ebl_hf.6 }

		# Set name and description
		character_event = { id = ebl_hf.7 }

		# Set-up effects
		character_event = { id = ebl_hf.8 }	

		# Clean-up variables
		character_event = { id = ebl_hf.9 }	

		# Add modifiers to all bloodline members
		# Requires ebl_bloodline_target global event target to be set
		character_event = { id = ebl_hf.100 }
	}
}
#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Initialize bloodlines' settings
character_event = {
	id = ebl_hf.6
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		#Initialize bloodlines' settings
		event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
			set_bloodline_flag = is_ebl_bloodline

			# Set bloodline_id flag
			founder = { character_event = { id = ebl_hf.2 } }

			# Save Bloodline as event target:ebl_bloodline_ABC
			founder = { character_event = { id = ebl_hf.3 } }

			# Activate bloodline
			any_bloodline_member = {
				set_variable = { which = active_ebl_bloodline which = global_ebl_bloodline_count }
			}
		}
	}
}
#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Set proper names and descriptions
character_event = {
	id = ebl_hf.7
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		#Set name and description
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_name value == 0} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_name = ebl_bloodline_name_0
				set_description = ebl_bloodline_description_0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_name value == 1} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_name = ebl_bloodline_name_1
				set_description = ebl_bloodline_description_1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_name value == 2} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_name = ebl_bloodline_name_2
				set_description = ebl_bloodline_description_2
			}
		}
	}
}
#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Set-up flags for bloodline stats
character_event = {
	id = ebl_hf.8
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		# Remove any existing flags
		event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_1
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_2
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_3
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_4
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_5
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_6
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_7
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_8
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_9
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_10
			clr_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_10
		}
		# Set-up effects
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value == 0} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_7
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_7
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_5
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value == 1} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_6
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_2
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_4
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_8
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value == 2} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_5
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_1
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_8
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_2
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_6
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_2
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value == 3} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_4
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_4
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_4
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_4
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_3
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value == 4} }
			event_target:ebl_bloodline_target = {
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_diplomacy_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_martial_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_stewardship_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_intrigue_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_learning_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_personal_skill_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_piety_10
				set_bloodline_flag = ebl_prestige_10
			}
		}
	}
}
#--------------------------------------------------
#------------------
#------ Clean up used variables
character_event = {
	id = ebl_hf.9
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		# Clean up used variables
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_picture value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_inheritance value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_matrilineal_override value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_allow_bastards value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_name value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = ebl_generate_bloodline_effects value = 0 }
	}
}
